entries.title: Add support for ByteArray in Starknet event decoder
entries.author: fracek
entries.summary: The Starknet event decoding helpers now support byte arrays. Byte arrays are decode as 0x hex strings.

entries.title: DNA v2 is now the default version in the documentation
entries.author: fracek
entries.summary: We have updated the documentation to use DNA v2 as the default version.

entries.title: Block production mode is now available to indexers
entries.author: fracek
entries.summary: Block handlers now receive the `production` argument to detect whether the block is live or backfilled. You can use this to trigger actions only when the chain's head is reached.

entries.title: DNA v2 is now available on production streams
entries.author: fracek
entries.summary: The production streams at a5a.ch now support DNA v2. These streams will support both v1 and v2 until v1 is officially phased out.

entries.title: Fix exception accessing blockHash of pending blocks
entries.author: fracek
entries.summary: We fixed an exception raise when accessing the blockHash of a pending block on EVM and Starknet indexers.

entries.title: New devlog section
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: The devlog is now available at `/devlog`.

entries.title: Reload runtime configurations on changes to project files
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: When the apibara.config.ts file changes, the runtime configuration is reloaded and all indexers restarted.

entries.title: Re-export `@apibara/indexer` in `apibara/indexer`
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: Users now need only to install the `apibara` package to implement indexers. All previous exports from `@apibara/indexer` are now available in `apibara/indexer`.

entries.title: Add option to override stream's gRPC options
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: Indexers can now override the default gRPC client options. This is useful for custom authentication schemes or to increase the maximum allowed message size.

entries.title: Fix live-reload of indexers that exited with an error
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: We fixed an issue that caused indexers that crashed with an error to not reload correctly.

entries.title: Add cli command to output machine-readable project information
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: The new `apibara write-project-info` command outputs machine-readable project information in JSON. Use this to get a list of available indexers and presets.

entries.title: Add source map support for better error reporting
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: We added source map support to the indexer, which will improve error reporting by showing the original source code instead of the compiled code.

entries.title: Reconnect on DNA server errors
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: We changed the indexers to automatically reconnect on DNA server errors.

entries.title: Fix Drizzle plugin support for TimescaleDB
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: We fixed an issue with the Drizzle plugin not correctly working with TimescaleDB. Now the reorg-related tables correctly deduce the user's table names.

entries.title: Add support for 'enum' Starknet events
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: The Starknet event decoder now supports 'enum' events. This means it's now possible to parse a contract's root events.

entries.title: Improve DNA message decoder performance
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: We switched the implementation of the DNA message decoder, resulting in 2x performance improvements. Users streaming large blocks will notice a significant speedup.
